page.title: 02LIFE STYLES
page.content: The tenant of Worden Park Cottage has lived there for the past ten years.The house came with the job of Park Warden although she has recently changed this to become a dog handler.She has two dogs of her own which have won many prizes.Her hobbies are,all sports, attending dog shows and walking her dogs around the park.There are only three houses in the park and all are very old.Two of them come with working for the council.Living in the park has its disadvantages.She often gets pestered by people asking for directions to facilities in the park and it is about a mile to the nearest shop.She enjoys living there and intends to stay until thrown out by the council.
